titleStmt.title: The two unhappy lovers; being a wealthy merchant who broke his heart for love, and the mercers beautiful daughter, who after his death, poysoned herself in dispair. Tune of, If love's a sweet passion. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[oshua]. Conyers, at the Anchor and Bible near St. Peter's Church in Corn-Hill.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name, date and place of publication from Wing.
Verse - "In London there lived a beatiful [sic] maid,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
